name: Require Post Tags
author: Josh Hartman

sections.description: Tired of untagged posts? Use this simple plugin to require users to add at least one post tag before saving a draft, updating a post, or publishing a post. This applies to normal posts and may not be compatible with custom write panels or custom post types.
sections.installation:
1. Extract the require-post-tags folder to your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the admin interface
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Extract the require-post-tags folder to your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the admin interface

Are there any settings I can adjust?

Nope, just install and activate, that’s it!

Have a question that is not addressed here?

Leave a comment on the plugin homepage http://www.warpconduit.net/wordpress-plugins/require-post-tags/

description: Tired of untagged posts? Use this simple plugin to require users to add at least one post tag before saving a draft, updating a post, or publishing a post. This applies to normal posts and may not be compatible with custom write panels or custom post types.
